== Notebooks With Ubuntu ==

See also: <nowiki>[[AustralianTeam-Projects-UbuntuFriendlyNotebooks]]</nowiki>

=== Introduction ===

These vendors provide Ubuntu pre-installed on their laptops in Australia.

More work is required to identify Australian retailers that are supporting Ubuntu on their notebook computers. For some possible contacts, see http://www.ubuntu.com/support/commercial/marketplace/oceania

=== Retailers Who Will Supply Notebooks With A Different Distribution of Linux ===

http://www.vgcomputing.com.au/products.html vgcomputing
